cn.introText: 嗨朋友,偶途是一款围绕地图进行软件服务的产品。在当前版本下它主要提供了基础的多点路径规划（导航），和运动数据记录（轨迹）两大板块的内容。{{在后续的开发计划中我计划拓展出第三个关键板块，同时根据大家的反馈，支持更多形式的运动数据记录，并且优化算法......}}未完待续......

en.introText: Hey friend, ooott is a map-based service app. In its current version, it primarily offers basic multi-point route planning (navigation) and sports data recording (tracking) functionalities.{{In future development plans, I aim to expand with a third key section, support more types of sports data recording, and optimize algorithms...}}Stay tuned...

sections.title: Route Planning Page
items: Long press on the map to edit points
